title: Executive Order 6810-Amendment of Executive Order No. 6657-A, of March 27, 1934
content: Section 1 (b) of Executive Order No. 6657-A, of March 27, 1934, prescribing regulations for payment of losses sustained by officers, enlisted men, and employees of the United States in foreign countries due to appreciation of foreign currencies in their relation to the American dollar, is hereby amended to read as follows:
"(b) while en route through a foreign country or to or from such post,".
This order shall be retroactive to April 1, 1934, the effective date of the order which it amends.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6810-Amendment of Executive Order No. 6657-A, of March 27, 1934 Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/373415
